residential.headline: The Present in Page
residential.description:
Life in the present is on offer in this chic, modern three bedroom ensuite townhouse that's perfectly situated for an urban lifestyle, just a stroll away from Belconnen's many inner city amenities.
Contemporary and convenient, the home is only a couple of years old and is in pristine condition. Cleverly designed to ensure maximum comfort and useability, the open plan living and dining rooms are downstairs, separated in the middle by a sleek, shiny kitchen.
The home's fresh, clean lines and sense of space are enhanced by the light flooding into the home. North-facing glass doors in the dining area and generous living room windows allows light to meet light and wash over the entire floor, highlighting the style, decor and neat functionality.
Upstairs the carpeted bedrooms have built-in robes with the main bedroom enjoying a walk-in robe and ensuite. All the modern comforts are here from the reverse cycle air conditioners to the water tank through to the external adjustable shade blinds on the rear bedroom windows.
Outside a neat rear courtyard garden has an entertaining area and enough garden to keep a green thumbed buyer happy. Just the right size, it would be unlikely to become an on-going chore or something that would stop you from going away for a while. The single garage has an automatic door, internal access and a parking space at the front.
Moments from main transport routes and the bus station, everything is on the doorstep here. On the inside there's a smart, tranquil home whose approx. 100sqm of immaculate living space will accommodate your lifestyle, here and now. Be sure to inspect.
-Immaculate, contemporary 2 storey townhouse -Downstairs: Open plan light-filled tiled living areas -Lounge room flowing to kitchen and north-facing dining area -RC/AC's in living room & dining area -Kitchen with gas cook top, electric oven, range hood -Dishwasher, built-in pantry, stone benchtops -Glass sliding doors from dining area to secure rear courtyard garden -Downstairs powder room -Upstairs: Main bedroom with walk-in robe & ensuite -Bedrooms 2 & 3 with built-in robes. -All bedrooms carpeted, each has a reverse cycle air conditioner -Main bathroom adjacent to bedrooms 2 & 3 -Instant gas hot water -Garage with auto door, internal & rear courtyard access. -Rear courtyard with entertainment patio & mulched garden -Body Corporate Fees: Approx. $565 per quarter -Strata Management: Independent BC. UP: 3884

residential.headline: SURPRISING SIZE - POSITION POSITIVE
residential.description:
Fronted by established trees and shrubs, the kerbside attraction of this four bedroom home is just a hint of what you can expect inside the front door.
Immaculately presented and in wonderful condition, the interior features neutral decor, timber flooring and a superb central kitchen that commands the run of the home - from the formal living and dining areas at the front to the east-facing bedrooms and even the glorious, light-filled family room at the rear which is lined by windows looking out to the gardens.
The master bedroom at the rear includes a spacious ensuite and an entrance wall of robes, while each of the family bedrooms remain in easy parental reach as they edge towards the front of the home. The entire property has been freshly painted both inside and out, plus Colorbond roofing was installed in 2012.
The private rear yard is terraced and remarkably long, currently including a paved area for BBQs or basketball practice and providing plenty of space for children or pets as well as an enormous expanse for gardeners and family cultivators. There's also a double garage with a similar sized workshop/storage area and off driveway parking for two more cars.
Located in an elevated loop street, even the position is excellent with community facilities such as child care and a preschool opposite as well as bus routes and shops within easy reach. Mount Rogers Reserve is only a few hundred metres away, too, if you're looking for exercise or pleasant walks.
This superb property is sure to appeal to discerning buyers looking for solid value and great fundamentals in a remarkably buoyant market.
Features include:
Four spacious bedrooms all with large built-in-robes Ducted gas heating Solar hot water Renovated bathroom and toilet (2006) Renovated kitchen (2002) with dishwasher Large family room extension to rear of home in 1999 External and internal painting just completed Back to base security system Large walk-in pantry Ceiling fans in kitchen and 3 bedrooms Generous sized laundry Hardwood timber floor through front living spaces Colorbond roofing installed in 2012 Watering system in main garden beds Double garage with large storage/workshop and 15 amp power Private and secure rear yard Ample under house storage Low maintenance and landscaped gardens Living area: 188sqm (approximately) Block size: 957sqm (approximately) Land rates: $1,685. Per annum (approximately)

residential.headline: Single level & separate title
residential.description:
Living here is safe, easy and comfortable. Suitable for first home buyers or downsizers, this single level much loved Townhouse has a neighbour on only one side and is situated next to a park.
There are no lawns to mow, no carpets to clean and best of all, no body corporate fees to pay! Safe? Absolutely! There are security screens and doors and internal access to the garage with a remote controlled door. Simply drive in, close the door and be safely home.
Spacious, paved, front and rear courtyards provide privacy and generous places to enjoy the outdoors to entertain, have a cuppa or enjoy the sun.
This special home has a reverse cycle air conditioner for comfort and is easily accessible to transport, shops and schooling. Inspect today to realise all of the benefits this home has to offer and to take advantage of the very realistic price the owner is offering to astute purchasers.
* Up-dated kitchen with ample cupboards
* Meals area adjoining kitchen
* Separate laundry with internal access to garage
* Built-in robes to 2 of the 3 bedrooms
* Spacious formal living area
* Reverse cycle air conditioner in living area
* Up-dated bathroom with bath & shower
* Separate toilet
* Linen cupboards
* Floating fooring to bedrooms
* Security screens & doors
* Colorbond fences
* Remote controlled garage door

features.otherFeatures: bath, renovated bathroom, renovated kitchen, pet friendly, close to parklands, close to schools
